Responsibilities: Position Overview: This individual will be part of a team that works directly with Army Aviation and Missile Center (AvMC) and Missile Defense Agency (MDA) Government customers on the C2BMC Distributed Training System (DTS Sim/Stim) conducting development, integration, fielding, and sustainment. Knowledge of networks, protocols, and RHEL commands will be required in the troubleshooting of various interfaces within and external to the DTS Sim/Stim Product Suite.
